QuestData.Title: A Foul Annoyance
QuestData.Description:
The Hozen are opportunistic and weak. It does not surprise me that some of their kind have thrown their lot in with the Old Gods.
We should take care of them before they become more than a nuisance.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Squidtail hozen in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
